title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 21 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 21 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Senator Rand Paul calls in to Clay and Buck to discuss Dr Fauci. Why is Dr Fauci obfuscating, lying about the Wuhan virus lab connection? Many scientists and doctors are afraid to speak out against Dr Fauci because he controls their funding. Should people who have already had covid, get the vaccine? Pelosi is playing politics with this “insurrection” on January 6. BuzzFeed breaks huge story, the FBI allegedly used at least 12 informants in the Michigan kidnapping case. That’s two FBI agents for every suspect. Can you say “entrapment”? What is the Taliban doing during the US withdrawal from Afghanistan?  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
